heading: MERN TODO App
text: This is a mern project with all crud operations.This project have three sections first is sing up page second is login page and third is dashboard page.I have made this project in EJS so every component is rendered on server.

heading: Quiz App
text: The project: “Quiz Application” is a collection of number of different types of questions on frontend textstack like html,css and JavaScript.A user can take the quiz and check his preperation for MCQ.At last you can get your score

heading: Random Color Generator App
text: This project generate '35' different  Hexa-decimal color code at every render.So if you want a beautiful color code you can check this project.

heading: Job Portal
text: This is an online job portal, built using ReactJS and Firebase.In this project Hr post jobs as their requirements and whose candidate have relevant skills they can apply for these jobs if the Hr select a candidate then I have implement a conversation module here

heading: Student Management System
text: This project hold Records of Students with their name ,email , and their image and you can filter the students with name , email and sort the students record alphabetically and numerical also.In this project I fetch the data with an api and show data here

heading: Button Ripple Effect
text: This project show beautiful animation effect on a button and I have made this project with html,css and javaScript Only

heading: Digital Clock
text: This project shows a beautiful digital clock and I have made this with html, css and JavaScript Only

heading: Registeration Form with Validations
text: In this project I have massively used JavaScript to put validation across every field to understand deep concepts of JavaScript.I hope you like this

heading: Cards Animations
text: In this project I have create beautifull card animations.So if you want to see a magic like cards you can check this project. I have made this project with html , css and JavaScript Only
